text: The August Revolution, also known as the Vietnamese Revolution happened in Vietnam in August 1945. It was an uprising for independence after the Japanese lost World War II in Asia. It led to the Declaration of Independence of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam on September 2, 1945. The independence war against the French would soon follow. Category:1945 in Vietnam Category:20th- century rebellions Category:Rebellions in Asia Category:Revolutions Category:North Vietnam
title: August Revolution
